mapper.select: SELECT e.ename AS name, d.dname AS dname, -- 计算总收入(工资+所有奖金) (e.sal + COALESCE(SUM(b.comm), 0)) AS totalIncome, s.grade AS salgrade, -- 联系方式优先取mobile，没有则取紧急联系人电话 CASE WHEN e.mobile IS NOT NULL THEN e.mobile ELSE e.emergency_contact ->> 'phone' END AS contactInfo, -- 下级员工姓名(使用字符串聚合) array_agg(sub_emp.ename) AS subordinateNames FROM emp e LEFT JOIN dept d ON e.deptno = d.deptno LEFT JOIN salgrade s ON e.sal BETWEEN s.losal AND s.hisal LEFT JOIN bonus b ON e.empno = b.empno -- 关联下级员工 LEFT JOIN emp sub_emp ON e.empno = sub_emp.mgr AND sub_emp.ename IS NOT NULL ${ew.customSqlSegment} GROUP BY e.empno, e.ename, d.dname, s.grade, e.mobile, e.emergency_contact ORDER BY e.empno
